==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=踌躇}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{zh-l|躊躕}}

===Etymology===
Reduplication with the original form of *''du da''.

Cognate with {{zh-l|*躑躅|tr=*dek dok}}, {{zh-l|*踟躕|tr=*de do}}, {{zh-l|*彳亍|tr=*tʰek tʰok}}, all meaning "walking slowly or with difficulty > hesitant".
